trans-unit.source: The command to execute on the target resource. (It must be specified after all other options or separator --). Example: aspire exec --resource api dotnet build . (command is dotnet build)
trans-unit.target: The command to execute on the target resource. (It must be specified after all other options or separator --). Example: aspire exec --resource api dotnet build . (command is dotnet build)

trans-unit.source: Run an Aspire app host to execute a command against the resource. (Preview)
trans-unit.target: Run an Aspire app host to execute a command against the resource. (Preview)

trans-unit.source: The path to the Aspire app host project file.
trans-unit.target: The path to the Aspire app host project file.

trans-unit.source: The name of the target resource execute the command against. Command will be executed only after target resource starts.
trans-unit.target: The name of the target resource execute the command against. Command will be executed only after target resource starts.

trans-unit.source: The name of the target resource to execute the command against.
trans-unit.target: The name of the target resource to execute the command against.
